name: Catch N Shoot Free
description:
NOTE: free game with ads, also look for the paid version with NO ads.

Put yourself in the shoes of a sharp shooting photographer with the task of taking pictures of insects … yes that’s right, bugs! We are talking about butterflies, dragonflies, cicadas, bees, wasps, etc. Each level will have 1 or more bugs for you to catch and shoot a picture with your camera. The fastest you capture all your targets and with the less number of shoots taken the higher your score. But be careful, some bugs can sting, and it may hurt so watch out and stay away from those aggressive insects … well, unless you have to take a picture of them.

The game contains many insects, many beautiful environments, and many levels to enjoy. You can control your camera using your device motion sensors (Accelerometer / Compass), using the D-pad, or just swiping on the screen. There are 3 difficulty levels to try (easy, normal and hard), you can adjust the camera shooting button (left/right), and enable vibration when you get sting (if available on your device). The game also has some educational information for you to get to know your bugs!

So go ahead and enjoy this unique photograph shooting action game!

More levels are on the way …

Search for our demo videos in YouTube or use the links below:

Demo 1
http://youtu.be/HkNpS1IcNxI

Demo 2
